Yandex Disk.name: P13.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it has systems in place to limit and monitor employee access to user information?

Yandex Disk.name: P13.02
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it has a security team that conducts security audits on the company’s products and services?

Yandex Disk.name: P13.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it commissions third-party security audits on its products and services?
